body: @AnonymousBoredom Depends on how much the girl actually "tries" to get out of it or how fucking retarded she is. Like here...it looks like she already cheated and then the guy used it to blackmail her later. Cases like this, the guy should tell her to fuck off as she doesn't actually care for or value him. She's easy...
Reading this reminded me the critical weakness to netorare: You can recover and still have a chance to stay with your lover if it’s sex-related blackmail.
